sourcesContent:
import { Table, Icon, Popup, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Badge } from '@shopify/polaris' import { toCurrency, formatDate } from '../utils/helper' const AcceptedPaymentRequest = ({ paymentRequestItems }) => { return ( Customer Id Bonus Amount Created At Updated At Status Action {paymentRequestItems && paymentRequestItems .filter((item) => item.status === 'PENDING') .map((item) => ( {item.customerId} {toCurrency(item.bonusAmount)} {formatDate(item.createdAt)} {formatDate(item.updatedAt)} {item.status} { setPaymentRequestId(item.id) handleChange() }} /> } /> } /> ))}
) } export default AcceptedPaymentRequest
